string-array.name: mes_quotes
string-array.item: "I'm still a geek on the inside, that's the important thing." ~ Al Yankovic
"When I was a kid, it was a huge insult to be a geek. Now it's a point of pride in a weird way." ~ J. J. Abrams
"I think I've been able to fool a lot of people because I know I'm a dork. I'm a geek." ~ Gwen Stefani
"If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" ~ Albert Einstein
"I don't like the idea of separating life and work. That notion seems dated and a bit alien to me." ~ Jeanne Moreau
